meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Drastal Meg Weglarz Anne Kanter Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1344.

td.p: Bill Drastal, a writer from Venice, California
Meg Weglarz, a designer from Mt. Lebanon, Pennsylvania
Anne Kanter, a homemaker from McLean, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,400)

tr.td: THE BLUE & THE GRAY
LEFTOVERS
'60s MUSIC
WORLD CITIES
THE MOVIES
ENERGY

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Anne: Who is Jeb Stuart Magruder?)
...
(Alex: Jeb Stuart Magruder was not in the Civil War.)
[Laughter]
(Anne: Jeb Stuart was.)
(Alex: We have less than a minute to go.)

Stonewall Jackson

AnneMeg
')
